text: Tara tomake nesa o juya sanbandhe jijnasa karache. Balo -- ''e'i duyete'i ache mahapapa o manusera jan'ya munapha, kintu tadera papa tadera munaphara ca'ite gurutara. Ara tara tomaya sa'oyala kare ki tara kharaca karabe. Balo -- ''ya barati thake.â€™â€™ E'ibhabe allah tomadera jan'ya banisamuha spasta karena yate tomara bhebe dekhate para
